body: This armor is crafted by dwarven stonesmiths from alchemically strengthened plates of basalt. Stoneplate is heavy and unwieldy, but offers incredible protection to its wearer. It is primarily used by dwarven druids who cannot wear metal armor.
name: Stoneplate
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Armor/Armor and Shields/Stoneplate
